overview: Ishan and Lamha are lovers, but had to part ways as Ishan left aboard fot further studies. After completing his studies Ishan returns and announce his marriage with his new girlfriend Nashfa. Lamha who still has feelings for Ishan is heartbroken but pretends to be happy for him.Lam tries her best to separate Nash and Ishan. Day before Ishan's marriage Lamha confess her feelings for Ishan leaving him in a dilemma. On the wedding day Nash encouraged Ishan to go after Lama which he does. While chasing Lam Ishan fall into the sea and Lamha jumps in to save him. Ishan confess his love for Lama and the both hug each other in the water.
title: Mee Loaybakee
